definition: to have a stiff neck after sleeping/(of the head) to touch the pillow
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
pillow/to pillow/to rest one's head on (Taiwan pr. [zhen4] for this sense)

sentences.english: Conclusion Balancing acupuncture is superior to conventional acupuncture in treating stiff neck.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察平衡針配合運動療法治療落枕臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Massage is also effective for a stiff neck.
sentences.chinese: 按摩對落枕也同樣有效。

sentences.english: I woke up with stiff neck.
sentences.chinese: 我似乎落枕了，脖子有些僵硬。

sentences.english: What's the frequently-used acupuncture method for stiff neck?
sentences.chinese: 落枕常用刺灸法是什麼？

definition: cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
a crick in the neck/stiff neck

pinyin: yao1 zhui1 jian1 pan2 tu1 chu1
yao1 zhui1 jian1 pan2 tu1 chu1 zheng4
